quoteText: You shall defend UBISOFT and hold it harmless in the event of inappropriate or illegal use of your Account, including in the event of illegal or inappropriate use by someone You have authorized to use your Account.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
